scripts.start-docker:all: concurrently "npm run start-docker:account" "npm run start-docker:blog" "npm run start-docker:file-manager" "npm run start-docker:notification"
scripts.start-service:api-gateway: concurrently "cross-env-shell gnome-terminal -- npx nx run api-gateway:serve" "cross-env-shell start cmd /k npx nx run api-gateway:serve"
scripts.start-service:account: concurrently "cross-env-shell gnome-terminal -- npx nx run account:serve" "cross-env-shell start cmd /k npx nx run account:serve"
scripts.start-service:blog: concurrently "cross-env-shell gnome-terminal -- npx nx run blog:serve" "cross-env-shell start cmd /k npx nx run blog:serve"
scripts.start-service:file-manager: concurrently "cross-env-shell gnome-terminal -- npx nx run file-manager:serve" "cross-env-shell start cmd /k npx nx run file-manager:serve"
scripts.start-service:notification: concurrently "cross-env-shell gnome-terminal -- npx nx run notification:serve" "cross-env-shell start cmd /k npx nx run notification:serve"
scripts.start-service:all: concurrently "npm run start-service:api-gateway" "npm run start-service:account" "npm run start-service:blog" "npm run start-service:file-manager" "npm run start-service:notification"
